# IncrementX

## Example

```html
 <amp-ad
  width="320" 
  height="50" 
  type="incrementx" 
  data-vzid="PNXW125273VB49B96">
  </amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration details and to generate your tags, please contact https://www.incrementx.com/contact-us.

Supported parameters:

-   `data-vzid`
